Hajimemashite, mina.  Boku wa JC desu.  Dozo Yoroshiku.  Now that we 
have =
introductions out of the way, I wished to ask about the evolution of 
the i=
ndividualistc 900-1100s samurai using horse bows to the conception 
of the =
primarily katana wielding samurai that you see in most depictions of 
the s=
amurai.  I know that the Mongolian invasion was when samurai battle 
tactic=
s really started to change to more unit-oriented style, but I am 
unfamilar=
 with when the transition to swords from bows occured and the 
how and why?=
